Class DefaultHttpClientFilterResolver

java.lang.Object
io.micronaut.http.filter.BaseFilterProcessor<ClientFilter>
io.micronaut.http.client.filter.DefaultHttpClientFilterResolver
All Implemented Interfaces:
BeanDefinitionProcessor<ClientFilter>, HttpClientFilterResolver<ClientFilterResolutionContext>, HttpFilterResolver<ClientFilterResolutionContext>
@Internal @Singleton public class DefaultHttpClientFilterResolver extends BaseFilterProcessor<ClientFilter> implements HttpClientFilterResolver<ClientFilterResolutionContext>
Resolves filters for http clients.
Since:
1.3.0
Author:
James Kleeh, graemerocher
